Reviews.Title: “Very nice...if you like this sort of thing.”
Reviews.Author: quin-i-bog
Reviews.Content: chose san domenico house convenient sloan square occasion impression odd ring doorbell 3pm afternoon odd reception photo confirmation id address taking photo copy drivers licence lucky happened dont habit carrying passport home country ive uk impression hot perfumed easily rectified staff 2 perfume diffusers door onto balcony 101 deluxe double decorated fussy camp style imagine 1980s house garden magazine tails throw cushions galore gilded mirrors bathroom compared bedroom basic cracked floor tiles chipped paintwork bath toiletries san domenico own label half 2 moulton brown miniatures missing fussy touches continued lavender pillows strangest handful rose petals loo pan didnt eat pot tea biscuits arrival arrived promptly nice king sized bed ok set mobile meant slid tried sit morning shower disappointing – plenty pressure terrible shower head drenched bathroom floor miss id management fussed lavender rose petals provided tvs 4 channels upgraded bathrooms perfume san domenico house probably nice experience appreciate camp fussy decor don’t mind decent tv ipod dock wifi sadly

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Great Service”
Reviews.Author: tarmachead
Reviews.Content: actually signed trip advisor leave review guys thank nice cant understand reviews criticizing hospitality happy aspect stay especially personal polite service experienced feel duty especially expected obviously location cleanliness perfect helpful balanced review little street noise 101 major bit noise morning walking hoovered major couldnt recommend

Reviews.Title: “Hidden little gem in Chelsea”

Reviews.Content: little bb perfect attempts boutique hotels london thrilled san domenico house offered excellent service real home home ambiance ideally located wihin stones throw sloane square kings road spot spend days staff bent backwards help request handle normally service city comes hefty price tag definitely choice future stay london
